title: Native Instruments Maschine 2 v2.4.0 UNLOCKED WiN-d33p57a7u5
description:
Native Instruments Maschine 2 v2.4.0 UNLOCKED WiN-d33p57a7u5
            ------------------------------------------------------
                                   (Audioz/R2R)

MASCHINE lets you effortlessly produce beats, melodies,
and harmonies with powerful drum synths, premium sounds,
an integrated sampler, and more Ö cutting-edge software
meets intuitive hardware for ultra-smooth workflow.

POWER OF SOFTWARE[b][/b]
The included MASCHINE 2 software is exploding with cutting-edge
technology. Improved browsing, arranging, and sampling, plus a
new mixer, plug-in strip, and exclusive drum synths. Get ready
for the most responsive, fluid, and musical beatmaking experience ever.

MASCHINE 2.4 OUT NOW!
Available now, the free MASCHINE 2.4 update opens the door to closer
integration of third party plug-ins in MASCHINE thanks to the new
Native Kontrol Standard (NKS) â€“ Native Instrumentsâ€™ groundbreaking
extended plug-in format. NKS-supported plug-ins from across the
industry can now take advantage of the unique workflow brought to life
by MASCHINE.

ENHANCED THIRD PARTY WORKFLOW WITH NKS
Seamlessly browse, edit, and perform on MASCHINE hardware with some
of your favorite third party plug-ins â€“ now with the same instant
control that KOMPLETE Instruments already offer. All your plug-ins,
all in one place â€“ software installed using the NKS extension now
also appear with their presets in MASCHINEâ€™s powerful tag-based browser.

And key parameters of NKS-ready third party products are pre-mapped
to MASCHINEâ€™s hardware controls, ready for when inspiration strikes.
Effortless music creation â€“ with true integration.





New in version 2.4
-Full support for the new Native Kontrol Standard (NKS):
content for NKS plug-ins will show up in the factory tab of
the Maschine Browser
-Products can be instantiated directly from the Product selector tab
-Third-party plug-ins are grouped by vendor in the hardware plug-in
browser and the instantiation context menu

Fixed Issues:
-Maschine could crash on loading if certain plug-ins in the project
are missing
-Modulation rings on certain parameters did not update while writing
modulation
-Inconsistencies in waveform zooming
-Scroll bars would become unaccessible after switching between Mixer
and Arranger views
-Certain plug-in views were not recalled correctly




[INSTALLATION]


1) The file is in 7zip format so use a proper extractor

2) No need for a previous installation.


[Update]

1. Run â€œNIMASCHINE240U.isoâ€ to install the update.


[New Installation]

1. Run â€œNI_Maschine_Regâ€ to add installation data to
the Windows registry.

2. Right-click on â€œNI_Maschine_Dirâ€ and click on
â€œRun as administratorâ€.

3. Run â€œNIMASCHINE240U.isoâ€ to install the update.




â€¢ Thats it! Done.

â€¢ Supp0rt th3 D3v3lop3r if you liK3 it.

3Nj0Y!!!
